text: President Trump is banning transgender
people from the United States military
he says it's because the military can't
be quote burdened with the tremendous
medical costs and disruption that
transgender in the military would entail
end quote the statement contrasts
strongly with the more LGBT friendly
tone he struck during his presidential
campaign portraying himself as a
champion of LGBT rights at the RNC I
will do everything in my power to
protect our LGBTQ citizens and defending
transgender people's rights to use the
bathroom of their choice people go they
use the bathroom that they feel is
appropriate
so if Caitlyn Jenner were to walk into
Trump Tower and want to use the bathroom
you would be fine with her using any
bathroom she chooses that is correct but
that policy changed once President Trump
took office in June the Pentagon
announced a freeze on allowing new
transgender recruits to the military to
review how they would impact quote the
readiness and lethality of our forces
end quote
but President Trump's announcement came
months before that review was to be
complete in December and seemed to catch
both the Pentagon and the White House
press office by surprise members of
President Trump's own party including
senators John McCain Joni Ernst and
Richard Shelby were quick to react to
the Twitter policy well I think you
ought to treat everybody fairly and you
ought to give everybody a chance to
serve while other conservatives like
religious leader tony Perkins and
congresswoman Vicky Hartzler
back to the president's decision pleased
to hear that Donald Trump shares my
readiness and cost concerns and will be
changing this costly and damaging policy
a 2016 rand study found that allowing
transgender people to serve openly in
the military would have minimal impact
on readiness and health care costs for
those active duty service members would
rise an infinitesimal point zero four to
estimates of transgender servicemembers
vary from 2000 to more than 15,000 what
would happen to them if Trump's policy
sticks remains unclear once he made a
decision he didn't feel it was necessary
to hold that decision and they're gonna
work together with the Department of
Defense to lawfully implement
[Music]
